name: Sy Snootles
Lore: 'Pa''lowick musician. Manager of The Max Rebo Band. Reports on Jabba to Lady Valarian. Bib Fortuna uses her as a double agent, feeding her false information.',
Text: 'During your deploy phase, where present, allows J''Quille or Bib Fortuna to deploy from Reserve Deck- reshuffle. Once each turn when you have at least 3 musicians on table, may play Ommni Box to cancel opponent''s Force drain at a related site.',
